ComicInfo.Summary: Tzenketh is on the brink of war against the Federation... and it's all the fault of Captain Sisko and his crew. A battle between the Tzenkethi, Romulans, and Cardassians is imminent, while Tzenketh itself begins to tremble. The Theseus crew's actions have exacerbated the volcanic instability of the planet-another thing the Romulans will undoubtedly pin on the Federation. The Romulan Magistrex's plot to build an alliance that will destroy the Federation is underway, can Sisko and his crew manage to save this savage world of glass and bone? Find out in the finale of arc three of the Eisner-nominated series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:37:09. [CVDB1048949]
ComicInfo.Characters: Ariennye T'Galatheon, Benjamin Sisko, Descheeni, Dr. Beverly Crusher, Harry Kim, Lily Sato, Miral Paris, Montgomery Scott, Preator Shinzon, T'Lir, The Doctor, Tom Paris
ComicInfo.Teams: Cardassians, Remans, Romulans, Starfleet, Tzenkethi Coalition, United Federation of Planets, USS Theseus Crew
